sentence.Network_en: Underneath the wagon, between the hind wheels a lean and rangy mongrel dog walked sedately.

entry.def: If you describe a person or animal as rangy, you mean that they have long, thin, powerful legs.

example.tran: 个子高挑、双腿瘦长的红头发女孩

means.word_mean: 1. tall and thin and having long slender limbs;
